text: ivaran allahu anugrahicca pravacakanmar. adam santatikalil pettavar. nuhineateappam nam kappalil kayarriyavaruteyum; ibrahiminreyum israyelinreyum vansattil ninnullavaranivar. nam nervaliyil nayikkukayum pratyekam terannetukkukayum ceytavaril pettavarum. paramakarunikanaya allahuvinre vacanannal vayiccukelkkumpeal sastangam pranamiccum karannum nilam patikkunnavarayirunnu ivar
